column6:
"GHOSTS ON THE RAILS" Part 1 (of 2),2005,1
Nightcrawler spends some quality time in his natural habitat - the dark. Before you can smell "Bamf", this spooky adventure takes our blue furry friend into the bowels of the New York subway.
column8: | writer:Roberto Aguirre-Sacasa | inker:Wayne Faucher | penciller (cover):Greg Land | colorist:Matt Milla | letterer:Cory Petit | penciller:Darick Robertson
